author: Flo (tonebytone)
content:
Gee, Roland, sorry you re still sick. I hope in a few days you'll be feeling much better. Can you get live miso where you live? Miso soup is great for dealing with digestive tract "bugs." If you can get the 3-yr old miso, not the white miso. The white stuff has no benefits other than taste.

Also, yogurt that has not been pasteurized can help kill off those bad bugs.

I like your tight composition.
